newsitem.title: CYPRUS: Gulf Air drops New York route through Cyprus.
newsitem.headline: Gulf Air drops New York route through Cyprus.

text.p: Gulf Air will stop flying to New York via Cyprus with Cyprus Airways on October 25, a spokesman for the Cypriot national carrier said on Tuesday.
The spokesman declined to say why the twice-a-week flights were cancelled.
"It is up to Gulf Air to say...for Cyprus Airways this route was successful and popular with tourists and the Cypriot community living in the United States," he said.
Under terms of the deal, Airbus seats belonging to Gulf Air were sold by Cyprus Airways to its customers.

"Gulf Air said they will undertake a survey to see if the route can resume in future with smaller aircraft," the spokesman said, adding that Cyprus Airways was in touch with other airlines to negotiate a similar deal.
